snippet.title: Saturn Longplay [189] Silhouette Mirage (JP)
snippet.description:
http://www.longplays.org

Played by: Tsunao

Platformer by Treasure.

Follow Messenger of JUSTICE Shyna as she attempts to restore the world to normal by booting some machine.

Gameplay involves changing colors from red (Mirage) to blue (Silhouette). Opposite colors does damage while same color drains Spirit (think: MP). There's also weapons and reflecting shenanigans. English version is known for being difficult due to unwarranted changes (like having weapons use spirit meter as ammo, which the Japanese version don't do). PS1 version adds a few new things, like 2 extra bosses.

Disclaimer: Most videos by World of Longplays use SaveStates!
